reply: To log in, use the Authentication service with email and password. Tokens are JWTs returned on success and should be sent in the Authorization header as 'Bearer <token>'.
Notifications are handled by the Notification service. Emails and SMS can be sent via configured providers (Twilio for SMS). The system publishes events to RabbitMQ for asynchronous delivery.
Appointments and scheduling are managed by the Customer Service. Check the appointments endpoints to create, update, and view schedules for customers and employees.
Employee assignments and time logs are stored by the Employee service. Use the employee endpoints to query assignments, schedules, and time logs.
Service and vehicle records are available via the Customer Service APIs. You can query services, vehicle histories, and modifications from the corresponding endpoints.
